News.headline: Loan Announcement: Tyrique Hyde
News.short_description: Midfielder Tyrique Hyde has joined Ware FC on loan until the end of the season
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that midfielder Tyrique Hyde has signed on loan with Ryman North Division club Ware FC until the end of the season.

The midfielder signed his first pro contract with the Daggers in August 2016 and has made nine appearances, scoring one goal for the club.

Tyrique also had a loan spell at Whitehawk earlier this year with fellow Dagger Jimmy Shepherd, making four appearances for the Hawks.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Tyrique Hyde is getting on at Ware FC.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
